description:
Attorney Robert Finnell founded our Rome law office, The Finnell Firm, with the goal of protecting the rights of victims living in Rome, nearby Cartersville and Cedartown and surrounding Floyd and Barstow counties. Thanks to Mr. Finnell's dedication to his goal, he has succeeded in helping over 10,000 injured victims during the course of his 40-year legal career. His long record of success and excellent reputation bring countless clients from throughout North Georgia to our law firm every year for assistance pursuing compensation in cases related to the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Product liability
  • Medical malpractice
  • Pharmaceutical errors
  • Wrongful death

In addition to our well-known personal injury practice, we also offer assistance to clients who sustained on-the-job injuries as they pursue the workers' compensation benefits they need to allow them to recover, without facing unnecessary financial burdens.

Whether your legal need is the result of an injury stemming from negligence or a workplace accident, you can turn to The Finnell Firm for representation upon which you can depend. Our lawyer will put his four decades of experience to work for you, ensuring the protection of your rights throughout the legal process. If you would like to learn more about how we can help, you can do so by scheduling a free initial consultation at our Rome law office.
